channel.title: People who can't run runelive/connect
channel.description:
Ok for windows 7 / 64 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
windows vista/xp/32 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (X86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
now to fix client go to the client.java
search for [CODE][runelivepk656.no-ip.org[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE]127.0.0.1[/CODE]
now search for: [CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(5555));[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594));[/CODE]
save, compile, to use the auto restart
use the sar.bat, if you windows 7 user / 64 bit no need to change
if your a windows xp/vista use: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
[CODE] ::Copyright © MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=[COLOR="#ff0000"]18000[/COLOR] this is seconds so this is 3 hours, each hour is 6,000 seconds. start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC/Logical[/CODE]

item.title: People who can't run runelive/connect
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

This isn’t a proper tutorial, and I don’t think we need a thread telling people how to run a server; We have threads for it already and people should be able to figure it out for themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: People who can't run runelive/connect
item.dc:creator: @kinky_whip kinky whip
item.description:
@kinky_whip wrote:

Ok for windows 7 / 64 bit:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

change the exit to pause it should now look like

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

windows vista/xp/32 bit:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (X86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

change the exit to pause it should now look like

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

now to fix client go to the client.java

search for

[runelivepk656.no-ip.org

change to:

127.0.0.1

now search for:

			socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(5555));

change to:

			socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594));

save, compile, to use the auto restart

use the sar.bat, if you windows 7 user / 64 bit no need to change

if your a windows xp/vista use:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

::Copyright © MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=[COLOR="#ff0000"]18000[/COLOR] this is seconds so this is 3 hours, each hour is 6,000 seconds. start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC/Logical

Read full topic
